ProjectSummary.tagline: It's time to meet my maker
ProjectSummary.summary:
This website was created because I'm more than just a one page resume. I'm also a website with a lot of links, images and text.

The real reason is because my second co-op job was at Peekapak as a Frontend developere. The four months there made me reflect on some parts of myself and how I can use my time there to my greatest advantage.

This site appeals to my personal beliefs and short-comings.
  • I wanted to walk away with a tangible representation of the knowledge and skills I gained from this experience.
  • I often forget syntax and how to connect various parts of code together. This is a template of re-usable code for personal use.
  • I learn best by applying what I learned in a practical way. By creating a website on my own, from start to end I can understand the process of implementing JavaScript, SCSS and Bootstrap.
Created to impress you.

text: Site was created to apply attach to resumes.
Copied Parallex Template from W3Schools.
Due to lack of experience in HTML, CSS and JavaScript, site was left in a half-finished, unpresentable state.
